title: Replace About Our Practice image with the uploaded photo

requirements.text: Update the image in the “About Our Practice” section (the at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the user-uploaded photo instead of the current placeholder image, while keeping the existing aspect-square layout, rounded corners, border, and shadow styling.

quotes: moreover add up the photo as above provided in the about our practise section

acceptanceCriteria: The About section no longer displays /assets/generated/ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png.
The About section image displays the uploaded photo from a static asset path under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The image remains square (aspect-square), object-cover, with the current rounded border, shadow, and border styling preserved.
All user-facing text remains in English.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected About-section image element referenced by the provided XPath; do not modify other sections in this change set.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change Hero/front-page background styling in this build request.
Do not add any backend logic or persistence.
Do not redesign the About section layout or copy beyond updating the selected image.

required: Cropped square portrait photo with neutral color balance and subtle contrast (ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg)
edits: Replace the About section placeholder image (ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png > ca-about-photo.dim_800x800.jpg)
